description: A lively blend of tangy and spicy flavors, perfect for sprinkling over salads, snacks, and drinks. Packed in a handy shaker for easy use, this masala instantly boosts taste and aroma.
A masterful mix of premium spices, this masala brings a rich, authentic taste to curries and vegetable dishes. Just a pinch adds a burst of flavor and aroma to your meals.
Finely ground turmeric with a vibrant color and earthy aroma. Ideal for curries, soups, and health drinks. Known for its natural healing and anti-inflammatory properties.
A robust blend crafted for chickpea dishes, this masala delivers a deep, authentic flavor and enticing aroma. Perfect for traditional chole and other North Indian recipes.
Whole cumin seeds with a warm, earthy taste. Essential for tempering and seasoning, they add depth to dals, curries, and rice. Rich in iron and known for digestive benefits.
Premium whole green cardamom pods, prized for their sweet, floral aroma. Ideal for desserts, teas, and savory dishes. A must-have spice for every kitchen.
A bold, aromatic blend for chicken curries, this masala ensures a perfect balance of spices for rich flavor and color. Enhances taste and supports a healthy appetite.
A zesty blend of freshly ground ginger and garlic, this paste brings robust flavor to curries, marinades, and stir-fries. Convenient and ready to use for everyday cooking.
Thick, smooth tomato puree made from ripe, juicy tomatoes. Perfect for adding a tangy base to curries, gravies, and sauces. No added preservatives, just pure tomato goodness.
